entity.name: phenotype_call
entity.query: select s.id as doc_id, s.external_id as project_external_id, s.parameter_id as parameter_id, s.procedure_id as procedure_id, s.pipeline_id as pipeline_id, s.gf_acc as marker_accession_id, gf.symbol as marker_symbol, s.allele_acc as allele_accession_id, al.name as allele_name, al.symbol as allele_symbol, s.strain_acc as strain_accession_id, st.name as strain_name, s.sex as sex, s.zygosity as zygosity, p.name as project_name, p.fullname as project_fullname, s.mp_acc as mp_term_id, ot.name as mp_term_name, s.p_value as p_value, s.effect_size as effect_size, db.name as resource_fullname, db.short_name as resource_name from phenotype_call_summary s join project p on s.project_id = p.id join ontology_term ot on ot.acc = s.mp_acc join genomic_feature gf on s.gf_acc = gf.acc left outer join strain st on s.strain_acc = st.acc left outer join allele al on s.allele_acc = al.acc inner join external_db db on s.external_db_id = db.id

entity.name: mps
entity.query: SELECT top_level_node_id FROM `mp_node2term` mp , mp_node_top_level tl WHERE term_id='${phenotype_call.mp_term_id}' and mp.node_id=tl.node_id

entity.name: mphigher
entity.query: SELECT mp.node_id, mp.term_id as mpTerm, inf.term_id, name, definition FROM `mp_node2term` mp , `mp_term_infos` inf WHERE mp.node_id=${mps.top_level_node_id} and inf.term_id=mp.term_id

entity.name: phenotype_parameter
entity.query: select stable_id, name from phenotype_parameter where id=${phenotype_call.parameter_id}

entity.name: phenotype_procedure
entity.query: select id, stable_id, name, stable_key from phenotype_procedure where id=${phenotype_call.procedure_id}

entity.name: phenotype_pipeline
entity.query: select stable_id, name, stable_key from phenotype_pipeline where id=${phenotype_call.pipeline_id}
